Citizen Men s 200 meters 660 BJ2117 01E Eco Drive $ 419.95 S&H: $ 0.00 GO TO SHOP at Leisure Pro help For active men and water sports enthusiasts, the Citizen Men's Eco Drive Rubber Strap 200M Watch is a high-quality timepiece with a stainless steel case and unidirectional, stainless steel bezel. The bold black dial has full chronograph function and a tachymeter with striking, sky-blue accents. Ideal for divers and outdoor adventures, the ISO-certified Citizen Men's Eco Drive Rubber Strap Watch features a metric depth display to 50 meters (164') and is water resistant to 200 meters (660'). The durable rubber watch band has a stainless steel buckle and the mineral crystal window is scratch resistant for rugged wear. Powered by Japanese quartz movement and fueled by natural and artificial light, the Citizen Men's Eco Drive Rubber Strap 200M Watch functions without a battery, and features a 60-day power reserve when fully charged. Watch has a 50 mm (1.96") case with a date window. Citizen Eco-Drive is fueled by light, it never needs a battery. Eco-Drive it's unstoppable. Fixed stainless steel bezel. Blue dial with luminous hands and Roman numeral hour markers. Month and minute markers around the outer rim. Date appears at the 4 o'clock position. Month scale appears around the outer rim. Three - 24 hours, day of the week and function. Eco-drive movement. Scratch resistant mineral crystal. Screw down case back. Case diameter: 38 mm. Case thickness: 10 mm. Push button deployment clasp. Water resistant at 100 meters / 330 feet. Functions: hours, minutes, seconds, perpetual calendar, chronograph, alarm. Chronograph - three sub-dials displaying: 24 hours, 60 minutes and 60 seconds. Eco-drive movement. Scratch resistant mineral crystal. Case diameter: 40 mm. Tang clasp. Water resistant at 100 meters / 330 feet. Functions: hours, minutes, seconds, calendar, chronograph. Water resistant to 99 feet. heart Citizen Men s AR3015 53E Eco Drive Stiletto Black $ 356.00 S&H: $ 0.00 GO TO SHOP at Amazon help Embolden any attire with the Citizen Men's Eco-Drive Stiletto Watch. Featuring Eco-Drive technology, this watch has been perfected to suit both the professional man and the outdoorsman. Solar powered, this watch never needs a battery and remains charged for months at a time, even in the dark. Plus, it has a sleek design. Perfect for accompanying you from weekday to weekend, this confident, all-black timepiece stands out with a silky black dial notched with hour markers for a stylish, minimalist effect. Continuing the theme, the stainless steel bezel is handsomely etched with simple hour markers. The dial's sharp hour-and-minute hands are polished and sleek, complementary the wide stainless steel band that features both matte and polished finishes. The bold linking band is built for long-last and offers quick one-hand fastening with a deployment clasp with push-button. Boasting scratch-resistant-sapphire dial-window protection and the reliability of Japanese-quartz movement, this modern man's timepiece is water resistant to 99 feet (30 M). heart Citizen Watch Men s Eco Drive Black Ion Plated Sta $ 475.00 S&H: $ 0.00 GO TO SHOP at Macys.com help Hit the town in this sleek, pitch-black watch from Citizen. heart Citizen Men s AR3015 53E Eco Drive Stiletto Black $ 356.00 S&H: $ 0.00 GO TO SHOP at Amazon Marketplace help Embolden any attire with the Citizen Men's Eco-Drive Stiletto Watch. Imaging never having to worry about winding a watch or making sure it has a functional battery. The perfect everyday timepiece that rarely requires your attention, wearing an Eco-Drive allows you to turn your attention to the more important things in life. heart Citizen Men s JY0050 55L Eco Drive Blue Angels Sky $ 671.25 S&H: $ 0.00 GO TO SHOP at Amazon Marketplace help and chock full of innovative features, the Men's Blue Angels Skyhawk A-T Chronograph Titanium Watch from Citizen Eco-Drive combines aviator-inspired style with a sleek, sporty design. Offering a maximum power reserve of 180 days, with a low charge warning within three days of stop point, this distinctive timepiece is both reliable and up for the next adventure. It also features a durable, hardened mineral crystal, original Blue Angels insignia on its case back, and Blue Angels logo on a bold black dial. With a multi-band atomic receiver that accepts signals in North America, Europe, and Asia, this efficient accessory provides both world time in 43 cities, and a perpetual calendar, making it ideal for traveling. There's also a digital display light, two alarms, 1/100 second chronograph that measures up to 24 hours, and a 99 minute countdown timer. Rugged, handsome, and built to last, this Citizen Eco-Drive original arrives in a gray box, along with a manual, information CD.Summary of Features: Atomic timekeeping with radio-controlled accuracy World time in 43 cities 2 alarms 1/100 second chronograph that measures up to 24 hours 99 minute countdown timer Digital display light Greenwich Mean Time display Rotating slide-rule bezel Non-reflective mineral crystal Power-reserve indicator heart Citizen Jy0050 55l Titanium Blue Angels Skyhawk Me $ 448.99 S&H: $ 0.00 GO TO SHOP at eBay help Here comes yet another chronograph from Citizen's Eco-Drives Skyhawk Flight watch series for men - Citizen JY0050-55L! This extremely light powered Citizen men's watch comes in a titanium case with a sporting Blue Angels insignia on its case back, and Blue Angels logo on the black dial. The atomic timekeeping of this Citizen Blue Angels gives precise time, thanks to its radio-controlled accuracy. This Citizen men's watch has digital display of the world time of around 43 different cities. The Citizen JY0050-55L also features 1/100 second chronograph that measures up to 24 hours, a 99 minute countdown timer, Greenwich Mean Time digital display. Moreover, this Citizen Blue Angels is engineered exclusively to sustain any extreme condition and last really longer! heart Citizen Men s JY0050 55L Eco Drive Blue Angels Sky $ 671.25 S&H: $ 0.00 GO TO SHOP at Amazon help and chock full of innovative features, the Men's Blue Angels Skyhawk A-T Chronograph Titanium Watch from Citizen Eco-Drive combines aviator-inspired style with a sleek, sporty design.
